title: Is Dragon Ball Based?
body:
Summary:
Project Name: Dragon Ball (DB)
Offering to Moonbase: 3,000 DB (20% of the total supply) for a $BASED-DRAGONBALL Liquidity Pool

Telegram: https://t.me/CryptoDragonBall
Website: In development
Medium: https://medium.com/@dragonballcrypto 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DragonBallCryp1

To whom it may concern,
It is I the founder and developer of Dragon Ball. Do you feel uncomfortable knowing that the team controls the majority of the supply and can y33t at any moment? Do you want massive rewards whilst only putting in a minimum amount? Is your butt sore from getting rekt and rugged the last few months?

Dragon Ball is the answer your looking for and is unequivocally based.  Why you ask? Well we have a big friendly dragon who will grant you DB once a month if you’re a top 50 holder. The dragon will also give his balls from the social sharing pool (30%) to everyone who has over 1DB at the end of the year.  
We’re also working on a PvP (wallet V wallet) 8-bit themed game where you wager whether you’ll beat the shit out of your opponent or not. You can only fight those who are in the same rank as you, that way the Krillins of the world won’t get JUST’D by a Frieza.
We implemented anti-rekt measures by reducing the team supply to 5%. We will also ship 20% of our balls to the MOONBASE. Although, if requested by the community, we will send more no questions asked.
By the end of the year, the community will hold between 80-95% of the supply and you’ll witness pure organic price action rather than market manipulation.
Additionally, we believe in fair launches, there will be only one sale, everyone gets in at the same price. You wont have to worry about any VC’s or private sale investors dumping their bags on you.
Are we based? Don’t tell me you don’t want a to hold some of my dragon’s balls. 3

Come be a fren, join the TG. https://t.me/CryptoDragonBall
choices: I'm not fond of balls sir.
author: 0xD3a46C6Ff5328C472AA9cd768E77bc0859D45231
